donate.description: Donate button of the tab which opens when you install PreMiD for the first time

version.description: {0} will be replaced with for example '2.5.0' -> {0} is a variable and should not be translated; Version text of the extension/app

tab.installed.start.description: {0} will be replaced with 'PreMiD' -> {0} is a variable and should not be translated; Button (redirects you to a promotional video) of the tab which opens when you install PreMiD for the first time

tab.troubleshooting.checks.extensionEnab.description: Check 1 of the tab which opens when you click on the troubleshooting button, in front of the text will be a checkbox (‚úì) or a cross (‚úó) depending on the result

tab.troubleshooting.checks.internetConne.description: Check 2 of the tab which opens when you click on the troubleshooting button, in front of the text will be a checkbox (‚úì) or a cross (‚úó) depending on the result

tab.troubleshooting.checks.appConnection.description: Check 3 of the tab which opens when you click on the troubleshooting button, in front of the text will be a checkbox (‚úì) or a cross (‚úó) depending on the result

tab.troubleshooting.checks.discordConnec.description: Check 4 of the tab which opens when you click on the troubleshooting button, in front of the text will be a checkbox (‚úì) or a cross (‚úó) depending on the result

tab.troubleshooting.checks.discordStatus.description: Check 5 of the tab which opens when you click on the troubleshooting button, in front of the text will be a question mark (?) since we can't check this

tab.troubleshooting.checks.presenceToDis.description: Check 6 of the tab which opens when you click on the troubleshooting button, in front of the text will be a checkbox (‚úì) or a cross (‚úó) depending on the result
